thread.title: Breaking: Akeredolu appoints Ifedayo SSG, others
thread.title_full: Breaking: Akeredolu appoints Ifedayo SSG, others

author: Tony
title: Breaking: Akeredolu appoints Ifedayo SSG, others
text:
Home » News » Breaking: Akeredolu appoints Ifedayo SSG, others Breaking: Akeredolu appoints Ifedayo SSG, others On 10:12 pm In News by Tony Comments 
Ondo State Governor, Rotimi Akeredolu has approved the appointment of Sunday Abegunde Ifedayo as Secretary to the State Government. Sunday Abegunde Ifedayo, Secretary to the Ondo State Government 
He also appointed Olugbenga Ale as his Chief of Staff. 
Governor Akeredolu equally appointed Jones Ogunmusere as his Senior Special Assistant (SSA) on Administration. 
Details later….
